author: tanmaymudholkar
body:
Modified storage of ECAL object types in TH1s to use TObject's UniqueID() rather than TH1's fBits, because the latter is intended for ROOT internal use only.

Link to corresponding PR to CMSSW master: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22744

Link to DQM GUI PR: https://github.com/dmwm/deployment/pull/595
title: ECAL histograms metadata fix (for P5 production CMSSW)
